text: Robert James Hutton, or "Lil' Bobby" (April 21, 1950 â€“ April 6, 1968) was an American political activist. He was born in Jefferson County, Arkansas. He was the treasurer and first recruit to join the Black Panther Party.Bobby Hutton bio from A Huey P. Newton Story. On the night of April 6, 1968, Hutton was killed by police officers after Hutton co-led an ambush on the Oakland police department. He was 17 years old. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:1968 deaths Category:African-American people Category:People shot and killed by law enforcement officers in the United States Category:American political activists Category:Politicians from Arkansas
title: Bobby Hutton
